segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing; the boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his arm as far as it can go, trying to grab as many cookies as possible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl standing nearby, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks excited and a bit impatient, her hand outstretched toward the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they must be sneaking cookies without the woman's knowledge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance is precarious, and I feel a sense of dread watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman isn't noticing any of this; she's just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame the boy, making him the focal point of this risky endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope the boy doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is both amusing and nerve-wracking at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
